content:
GridResizeDirection Enum

Definition

Specifies whether a GridSplitter control redistributes space between rows or between columns.

In this Article

public enum GridResizeDirection
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
GridResizeDirection

Remarks

Use this enumeration to set the ResizeDirection property of the GridSplitter control.

Fields

Auto

Space is redistributed based on the values of the stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment*, stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment*, stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth*, and stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight* properties of the GridSplitter.
Columns

Space is redistributed between columns.
Rows

Space is redistributed between rows.
